name: akeyless-assets-commons
description: Shared SVG asset library for the Akeyless fleet management platform, providing vehicle map icons, dashboard warning indicators, general UI SVGs, and helper utilities.
story: akeyless-assets-commons is the centralised visual asset library for the Akeyless fleet management platform. It houses all inline SVG constants and JSX components used across the client applications: coloured vehicle map-marker icons for nine vehicle types (car, bus, truck, jeep, crane, forklift, motorcycle, scooter, bicycle) each in four ignition/speed-derived colour states; dashboard warning icons for standard OBD faults; general-purpose UI icons such as map markers, flags, and action buttons; and React components including CarPlate, IlPlate, UsPlate, and GoogleSvg. Helper utilities for licence-plate formatting, compass bearing calculation, and Tailwind class merging are also included. The library exposes a single entry point so consumers can import any asset with a single import statement.
capabilities: Vehicle map icon rendering (9 vehicle types x 4 colour states)
Dashboard warning icon set (low fuel, battery, tyre pressure, ABS, airbag, check engine, charging)
General-purpose UI SVG constants (map markers, action icons, logos, flags)
Car licence plate rendering (Israeli and US formats)
Compass bearing calculation for vehicle direction
